name: TBC: Musical Gems
description:
Find Musical Gems and listen to the sounds of your City through an interactive AR Music experience.

Activate Drop Points around your city to watch and listen as Musical Gems turn the people around you into your own unique one of a kind AR soundscape. Hear electronic sounds in London that echo it's strong club culture history, or head to the Agatha Christie Sculture in Covent garden to experience classical sounds from the writers by gone era, or in Korea the sounds inspired  by Kpop trending across your path,making every experience an AR party and experience not to be missed! 

We also would plan to develop a version for the visually impared as the user case for this type of location based audio detection would be very helpful for people with those needs.
